verses.kjv: O sing unto the LORD a new song; for he hath done marvellous things: his right hand, and his holy arm, hath gotten him the victory.
verses.ct: Sing a fresh song to the LORD, because he has accomplished amazing things! His powerful hand and his holy arm have won the victory for him.

verses.kjv: The LORD hath made known his salvation: his righteousness hath he openly shewed in the sight of the heathen.
verses.ct: The LORD has revealed his salvation; he has displayed his righteousness for all the nations to see.

verses.kjv: He hath remembered his mercy and his truth toward the house of Israel: all the ends of the earth have seen the salvation of our God.
verses.ct: He has not forgotten his mercy and his faithfulness to the people of Israel. Every corner of the earth has witnessed the salvation of our God.

verses.kjv: Make a joyful noise unto the LORD, all the earth: make a loud noise, and rejoice, and sing praise.
verses.ct: Shout with joy to the LORD, everyone on earth! Burst into celebration, be glad, and sing praises.

verses.kjv: Sing unto the LORD with the harp; with the harp, and the voice of a psalm.
verses.ct: Make music to the LORD with the harp â€” with the harp and the sound of singing.

verses.kjv: With trumpets and sound of cornet make a joyful noise before the LORD, the King.
verses.ct: With trumpets and the blast of the horn, shout joyfully in the presence of the LORD, the King.

verses.kjv: Let the sea roar, and the fulness thereof; the world, and they that dwell therein.
verses.ct: Let the sea thunder along with everything in it, and the world with all who live there.

verses.kjv: Let the floods clap their hands: let the hills be joyful together
verses.ct: Let the rivers clap their hands, and let the mountains celebrate together

verses.kjv: Before the LORD; for he cometh to judge the earth: with righteousness shall he judge the world, and the people with equity.
verses.ct: in the presence of the LORD, because he is coming to judge the earth. He will judge the world with righteousness and all peoples with fairness.
